multiple_choice.question: Why was Hare jealous of Monkey?
What happened to Hare and Monkey?

fill_in_the_blanks.question: They went into some people's farm and began to eat maize
Monkey tried hard to escape but he was unable to
Hare took Monkey's tail to go and cook it

meanings.together: with or in proximity to another person or people
meanings.jealous: feeling or showing an envious resentment of someone

meanings.lesson: a period of learning or teaching
meanings.escape: break free from confinement or control
meanings.invite: make a polite, formal, or friendly request to someone to go somewhere
